document_data.mainbody:
Armors of devotion were enchanted sets of plate mail armor imbued with defensive holy magics.
Apart from their splendorous appearance, armors of devotion produced a soft hum of constant prayer to some deity.
When these plates were donned by a paladin, the armors eternal devotion enchantment allowed the wearer to recharge a power based on channeling their oath, once per day.
One such set of paladins plate armor was available for purchase from Roah Moonglow, a merchant of questionable morals and allegiances who worked with the Cult of the Absolute in the . The halfling merchant was a representative of the Zhentarim who had an armor of devotion on offer during her time in the Moonrise Towers in the town of Reithwin and later, in the city of Baldurs Gate.
